biotools.summary: VCF2CAPS is a VCF file analysis tool for CAPS marker development. The software facilitates the conversion of a large number of single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs), multiple nucleotide polymorphisms (MNPs) and insertion/deletion (indel) polymorphisms detected by SNP calling tools, e.g. SAMtools, Platypus or FreeBayes, into CAPS markers.
